name: Summary of federal obligations and outlays for research, experimental development, and R&D plant, by type of R&D, performer, and field of science and engineering: FYs 2019–21
description: Summary of federal obligations and outlays for research, experimental development, and R&D plant, by type of R&D, performer, and field of science and engineering: FYs 2019–21

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_type_of_r_d_performer_and_field_b
variableMeasured.description: Type of R&D, performer, and field hierarchy

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Because of rounding, detail may not add to total. Percentages are computed using actual dollars reported. FYs 2020 and 2021 data include obligations from supplemental COVID-19 related appropriations (e.g., Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security [CARES] Act).
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development.
